product_name: Estee LauderRevitalizing Supreme+ Youth Power Anti-Aging Eye Balm
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingNow your eyes can have it all: firmness, strength, radiance, and a new, more lifted look with Estée Lauder's Revitalizing Supreme+ Youth Power Eye Cream. This richly nourishing moisturizer significantly improves firmness and elasticity for a supple, less puffy look around the delicate eye area.
details: DetailsBenefitsYour eyes can have it all: Firmness. Strength. Radiance. And a new, more lifted look.With 99% naturally derived Hibiscus Morning Bloom and exclusive Moringa Extracts, you'll empower the skin around your eyes to reveal its youth potential.This richly nourishing balm significantly improves firmness and elasticity for a supple, less puffy and more lifted look around the delicate eye area. Reduces the look of lines and dark circles. Leaves the eye area looking radiant and more youthful.For an added boost, can also be used as a weekly eye mask.The richly nourishing balm texture cushions and comforts the delicate skin around your eyes. Absorbs quickly to create a radiant base for any eye look.Key IngredientsExclusive Hibiscus Morning Bloom ExtractNature at its most powerful. Estée Lauder scientists discovered that Hibiscus sinensis flowers harvested early in the day hold the highest collagen-boosting activity.So we gather hand-selected blooms in the morning for peak potency, then - in a process that takes 83 days from harvest to manufacture - create Estée Lauder's extract that helps powerfully encourage skin's natural collagen.Exclusive Moringa ExtractOften referred to as the "miracle tree," Moringa is one of the most effective Youth Power ingredients we've ever discovered.The extract, created through an exclusive, patent-pending process, supports a powerful protein, helping skin empower multiple anti-aging pathways.Cactus Stem Cell Extract and Hyaluronic AcidAdditional high-performance ingredients add to the power of Revitalizing Supreme+.An infusion of Cactus Stem Cell Extract and Hyaluronic Acid helps reveal stronger, nourished, more hydrated skin. Skin's vital moisture barrier is strengthened.Collagen Boosting TechnologyOur formula combines Estée Lauder's nature-powered ingredients with their Collagen Boosting Technology, to help reignite skin's power to help skin feel firmer, look more lifted.FeaturesOphthalmologist-testedDermatologist-testedWon't cause breakouts, won't clog pores (non-acnegenic)Item 2591396How To UseApply Youth Power Anti-Aging Eye Cream AM and PM around eye area, as part of your daily skin care regimen. For maximum benefits, use this eye moisturizer as a weekly eye mask. Leave on for 2 minutes, then blot excess with tissue.IngredientsWater\Aqua\Eau, Methyl Trimethicone, Propanediol, Isododecane, Polyethylene, Dimethicone, Butylene Glycol, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Cetyl Peg/Ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, Stearyl Dimethicone, Nylon-12, Isononyl Isononanoate, Moringa Oleifera Seed Extract, Hibiscus Sinensis Flower Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Laminaria Digitata Extract, Whey Protein\Lactis Protein\Proteine Du Petit-Lait, Opuntia Tuna Extract, Acetyl Glucosamine, Tocopheryl Acetate, Narcissus Tazetta Bulb Extract, Squalane, Hydrolyzed Rice Extract, Algae Extract, Limonium Vulgare Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Silybum Marianum (Lady'S Thistle) Extract, Mimosa Tenuiflora Bark Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Extract, Sigesbeckia Orientalis (St. Paul'S Wort) Extract, Caffeine, Hordeum Vulgare (Barley) Extract\Extrait D'Orge, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Extract, Propylene Glycol Dicaprate, Glucose, Magnesium Sulfate, Sucrose, Glycerin, Pinanediol, Camphanediol, Hexylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Boron Nitride, Maltodextrin, Aminopropyl Ascorbyl Phosphate, Methicone, Artemia Extract, Polysilicone-11, Alumina, Isoceteth-20, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Lauryl Peg-9 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Citric Acid, Octadecene, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Disodium EDTA, Bht, Potassium Sorbate, Chlorphenesin, Phenoxyethanol, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply Youth Power Anti-Aging Eye Cream AM and PM around eye area, as part of your daily skin care regimen. For maximum benefits, use this eye moisturizer as a weekly eye mask. Leave on for 2 minutes, then blot excess with tissue.
ingredients: Iron Oxides (Ci 77491).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: Just started using this product. Love Love. I saw a difference immediately. Great moisture. Great friend to my skin.

reviews.headline: My eyes look better.
reviews.comments: Like what it does.

reviews.headline: I love it
reviews.comments: Too expensive:(

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: This product is great for the lines under and around your eyes. It makes them disappear!

reviews.headline: Worth the price
reviews.comments: This eye balm is actually amazing, i noticed about 2 weeks of using it my discoloration was evening out and lines were softened. I didnt look so exhausted anymore. Overall it's pricey but worth it!!

reviews.headline: I love this eye cream
reviews.comments: I definitely will buy this again as I am seeing a noticeable difference. It is not greasy or heavy like most eye creams.

reviews.headline: Re-awakens eye areas natural collagen production
reviews.comments: This eye cream helps your eye area repair itself easier by boosting collagen production. Great for people with crepiness around the eye

reviews.headline: So silky around eye area
reviews.comments: Love this eye cream also doubles up as eye mask

reviews.headline: This crème WORKS
reviews.comments: What a luscious feel to this silky crème. It does what it says. I will be purchasing this again.  It absorbs readily with massaging application.  A splurge item worth the $$$.

reviews.headline: Protect & Pro-Age
reviews.comments: Love the gorgeous creamy texture of this balm. Feels fo hydrating when applied under my eyes. I like the Pro-Aging ingredients and its a great starting point for anyone wanting to get into more advanced skin care routine.

reviews.headline: Hydrating
reviews.comments: Soft and creamy,  my wye area looked more lifted

reviews.headline: Revitalizing supreme youth power eyebalm
reviews.comments: I use this eye cream as mask at night. I love it! It hydrate, and take care of the puffiness and lines and wrinkles..

reviews.headline: Best eye cream for crows feet and dark circles
reviews.comments: My under eyes are always dry and has some advanced crows feet and i noticed a difference in my overall look. Lines are reduced and i look more rested

reviews.headline: Sculpted eye
reviews.comments: Love how lifted and smooth my eyes look

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: I'm in my early 30s and started noticing fine (dehydration) lines around my eyes. I received a sample of this eye cream, not expecting it to make a difference. Boy was I wrong! I've been using it both day/night and the fine lines around my eyes have improved significantly! I have dry, sensitive skin and have not had any issues. I purchased the full size already. Worth the high price for me. Bonus: perfect to use under a hydrating concealer!

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: I'm in my early 30s and started noticing fine (dehydration) lines around my eyes. I received a sample of this eye cream, not expecting it to make a difference. Boy was I wrong! I've been using it both day/night and the fine lines around my eyes have improved significantly! I have dry, sensitive skin and have not had any issues. I purchased the full size already. Worth the high price for me. Bonus: perfect to use under a hydrating concealer!

reviews.headline: Best I have found!
reviews.comments: I have tried many eye creams and I finally think I have found the perfect one.  It is moisturizing, goes on very easy.  I wanted something to work on wrinkles and eyelids and I really think I can finally tell a difference using this product.  I highly recommend.

reviews.headline: Great Product
reviews.comments: I blot under my eye and over eye lid, smooths out the area reducing appearance of fine lines.

reviews.headline: Eye cream
reviews.comments:
I just started using it after reading all the good  reviews. 
It hydrates and absorbs well. My eye bag is decreased. I love this product and I will continue to use it. If I notice any other good changes to my eyes, I will make it my permanent eye cream.

reviews.headline: I would definitely buy this product again.
reviews.comments: I have been using this eye balm for a week now at night. This is the best product I have used so far. This lightweight balm melts into a silky cleansing oil as you massage over skin leaving my skin so nourished and smooth.

properties.name: Pros

values.label: one who has puff, dark circle and lines of eyes

display_values: one who has puff, dark circle and lines of eyes

media.headline: Works well…if the jar is full.
media.caption: Half full jar.

faceoff_positive.comments: This actually worked to reduce my dark circles! After about two weeks, my dark circles were reduced by a lot. The puffiness of my eyes was also reduced, but not as much as the dark circles. This cream also has good hydration. It is a little tinted, so it helps reduce dark circles in that way, too. I evaluated whether it reduced the circles before I reapplied, so it's not just the tint that made me think it reduced them, don't worry.
faceoff_positive.headline: Made an account to write this review

faceoff_negative.comments:
I've been using only EL products for 25 years. My skin always looks great.This eye cream nourishes my eye area and smooths lines. 
 
Before this jar arrived my rating would be a solid 5. I rate this 1 because the jar is not full. Approximately 1/2 of product is simply not there. There's a bubble or hole where it should be. 
I've tried to exchange for a full jar multiple times using online chat and customer service calls with no resolution.I cannot get a live person on the phone to explain it.I understand mistakes happen in production. But for EL to make it impossible to resolve is wrong. 
It's time for me to begin researching a different line who is responsive to its customers.
faceoff_negative.headline: Works well…if the jar is full.

rollup.name: Revitalizing Supreme+ Youth Power Anti-Aging Eye Balm
